text: "Rikki Don't Lose That Number" is a 1974 song by Steely Dan and is the opening track from their third studio album Pretzel Logic. It went to number 3 in Canada, number 4 in the United States and number 30 in Australia. It was covered by Tom Robinson in 1984 and went to number 58 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Steely Dan songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Jazz rock songs Category:Boogie rock songs
title: Rikki Don't Lose That Number
